      • getStyleClass

        public List<String> getStyleClass()
        Gets all possible style classes for any item. E.g. if getStyleClass(a) returns ["foo"] and getStyleClass(b) returns ["bar"], then this method should return ["foo", "bar"].
        Specified by:
        getStyleClass in interface DataRenderer<DataHandler<?>>
        Returns:
        all possible style classes for any item
